job_posted.subject: Job Available!
job_posted.body:
Hi [TEACHER_NAME]

New job is posted, please see here [JOB_LINK].

 

 

Thanks

offer_recieved.subject: You received an offer
offer_recieved.body:
Hi [USER_NAME]

Your recieved a new offer from a teacher, go to [JOB_LINK] to see your offers. 

Thanks

offer_accepted.subject: Your offer was accepted!
offer_accepted.body:
Hi [TEACHER_NAME]

Your offer for [JOB_LINK] was accepted by [USER_NAME], see webinar here [WEBINAR_LINK].

 

Thanks

payment_success.subject: Payment Success!
payment_success.body:
Hi [USER_NAME]

Your payment of [JOB_PAYMENT] was success, please see attached pdf file with the invoice.

 

Thanks

webinar_setup_student.subject: Webinar Setup!
webinar_setup_student.body:
Hi [USER_NAME]

Webinar page is setup, please go to the webinar page [WEBINAR_LINK]

 

 

Thanks

webinar_setup_teacher.subject: Webinar Setup!
webinar_setup_teacher.body:
Hi [TEACHER_NAME]

Webinar page is ready to setup. Teacher will setup before the said date.

 

Thanks
